2100500.name: Swimming Poo
2100500.description: Let yourself be carried away by the incessant pursuit. Play the role of a boy - Simon and show the pool guards who is in charge! Feel the taste of commercial America of the 1960s, blending into a fairy-tale aquapark full of attractions. Demonstrate agility in competition with enemies by farting and polluting pool zones, destroying their filtering pumps. Only this will allow you to recover secret confectionery recipes that will be with you forever. Don't forget about your best friend Poopie, who is always ready to help you come out alive. Have fun!
2100500.supported_languages:
英语*, 波兰语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
